statements: SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance WHERE meeting_id = 100;
SELECT participant_id, time_in, attendance_status FROM meeting_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_id FROM meeting_attendance ORDER BY time_in DESC;
SELECT participant_id, attendance_status FROM meeting_attendance WHERE time_out IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance WHERE attendance_status IN ('Absent', 'Late') ORDER BY time_in ASC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) FROM meeting_attendance GROUP BY participant_id;
SELECT meeting_id, time_in, time_out FROM meeting_attendance ORDER BY time_in DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance WHERE time_out IS NULL AND attendance_status = 'Late';
SELECT AVG(time_out - time_in) AS avg_meeting_duration FROM meeting_attendance;
SELECT * FROM MeetingAttendance;
SELECT meeting_id, attendance_status, check_in_time FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE participant_id = 123;
SELECT participant_id, activity_type FROM ParticipantActivity WHERE participant_id = 456 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, attendance_status, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE attendance_status='Present';
SELECT meeting_id, participant_id, check_in_time FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE check_in_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT meeting_id, participant_id, check_in_time FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE check_out_time IS NULL;
SELECT participant_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM ParticipantActivity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ParticipantActivity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_id, participant_id, attendance_status, check_in_time FROM MeetingAttendance WHERE attendance_status != 'Absent' ORDER BY check_in_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records;
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date FROM meeting_details ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, activity_type FROM participant_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT DISTINCT participant_id FROM participant_activity;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_duration FROM meeting_details WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status='Present';
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date FROM meeting_details ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, activity_type FROM participant_activity WHERE activity_type='Workshop' ORDER BY activity_datetime ASC;

SELECT attendance_id, meeting_id, participant_id, attendance_status FROM attendance_records INNER JOIN meeting_details ON attendance_records.meeting_id = meeting_details.meeting_id WHERE attendance_status='Absent';
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM participant_activity GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_activities > 2;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_duration FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT participant_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM participants p JOIN activity a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id WHERE activity_type = 'Training';
SELECT * FROM meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, meeting_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Manager';

SELECT meeting_date, meeting_time, participant_name FROM meetings INNER JOIN attendance ON meetings.meeting_id = attendance.meeting_id INNER JOIN participants ON attendance.participant_id = participants.participant_id WHERE attendance.attendance_status = 'Present';

SELECT participant_name, activity_type, activity_date FROM participants INNER JOIN activity ON participants.participant_id = activity.participant_id WHERE participants.participant_role = 'Developer' ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM activity GROUP BY activity_type ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance;
SELECT meeting_id, attendance_status FROM meeting_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT participant_id, activity_type FROM participant_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participant_details WHERE participant_role = 'Admin';
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_topic, meeting_location FROM meeting_details WHERE meeting_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendance;
SELECT DISTINCT participant_id, attendance_status FROM meeting_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_role FROM participant_details ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, meeting_location FROM meeting_details WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;

SELECT participant_name, activity_type, activity_duration FROM participant_details JOIN participant_activity ON participant_details.participant_id = participant_activity.participant_id WHERE activity_type = 'Workshop' ORDER BY activity_duration DESC;
